sourcesContent:
import { React, useContext } from 'react' import NoteContext from '../context/notes/noteContext' const NoteItem = (props) => { const context = useContext(NoteContext); const { deleteNote } = context const { note } = props.note return (
{note.title}

{note.content}

{ deleteNote(note._id) }}>
) } export default NoteItem
